Test Name: Saccharomyces cerevisiae Antibody, IgA (ASCA IgA), Serum
Purpose: Detection and quantitation of Saccharomyces cerevisiae IgA antibodies to aid in the diagnosis of inflammatory bowel diseases such as Crohn's disease.
Equipment: Automated ELISA reader, microplate washer, incubator (37Â°C), single and multichannel pipettes
